Class ListView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.events.EventBase

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context

    public class ListView
extends LinearLayout
    View that shows a scrollable list of objects

      • measure

        public View.Layout measure(Point boundaries)
        Description copied from class: View
        This method should determine the View size and should be called by parent ONLY if the child layout width or height equals WRAP_CONTENT otherwise parent SHOULD calculate item size by itself

        Result item size SHOULD be set by resolveLayout after it was calculated

        Overrides:
        measure in class LinearLayout
        Parameters:
        boundaries - max element size
        Returns:
        measured layout
